Immortal life code?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Game Shark Codes & Dex Drive Saves: Immortal life code?
By Vahn Conseus on Friday, April 28, 2000 - 07:00 pm:

does anyone have a code to make a monster live forever? i really need it!

By Dark Phoenix on Friday, April 28, 2000 - 09:07 pm:

80097A30 ???? should do it. For the ?? enter any value other than zero. Do NOT enter in zero there whatever you do.

Remember that your monster will be stuck in whatever Life Stage it was in when you enter the code.

By Nate Railsback on Monday, July 31, 2000 - 04:46 pm:

Actually, this is wrong. The number that you enter in is how many weeks left it has to live, so if you enter 1, then it will always be super-old. If you enter (Maximum Lifespan/2 in hexadecimal), it will always be in its prime. I found this out while trying to perfect my copies of the monsters lost in my memory card malfunction back in January. I also occasionally use the ten-weeks-left-to-live version if a monster dies right during/right after the M4 and Legends Cup ("NO, dammit! Umaro is NOT going to die just after beating Most!").

By Dark Phoenix on Wednesday, August 2, 2000 - 02:47 am:

Try this GS code.....30097B93 0005. I think you'll like it :)

By Nate Railsback on Thursday, August 3, 2000 - 07:19 pm:

? I'm not experienced enough of a hacker to know what it does on-sight, and I'm wary of entering any code into my game that I'm unsure of the consequences of (particularly in a game like this, where you often can't TELL). So, um, what DOES it do? If you don't want to post it, could you at least e-mail me the answer?

By Dark Phoenix on Friday, August 4, 2000 - 03:48 am:

I just recently discovered this code. This code makes a monster live out its entire lifespan in its prime.

By Dark Phoenix on Wednesday, February 28, 2001 - 01:16 am:

BTW, the famed Immortal code you want is 80097A30 ????.

Put any non-zero value you choose where the question marks are.

**Whatever you do, do not put 0000 in as the ???? mark value in the above code. Doing so will result in the immediate death of your monster!**
